posts.title: 实用工具
posts.text: 截图工具: FSCapture pdf阅读: Adobe Acrobat DC

posts.title: apache同一ip部署多个项目配置不同域名
posts.text: 服务器环境由wamp搭建,假定wamp安装在C盘根目录下 1.进入apache配置目录配置监听端口,修改httpd文件,新增端口监听vi C:\wamp\bin\apache\apache2.4.23\conf\httpd Listen 0.0.0.0:80 Listen [::0]:80 Listen 0.0.0.0:4700 Listen [::0]:4700` 2.修改httpd-vhosts文件,配置项目及域名vi C:\wamp\bin\apache\apache2.4.23\conf\extra\httpd-vhosts ` <VirtualHost 目标域名1> ServerName 目标域名1:80 ServerAlias 别名 DocumentRoot c:/wamp/www <Directory "c:/wamp/www/"> Options +Indexes +Includes +FollowSymLinks +MultiViews AllowOverride All Require all granted </Directory> </VirtualHost> <VirtualHost 目标域名2> ServerName 目标域名2:4700 ServerAlias 别名 DocumentRoot c:/wamp/项目2 <Directory "c:/wamp/项目2"> Options +Indexes +Includes +FollowSymLinks +MultiViews AllowOverride All Require all granted </Directory> </VirtualHost>`
